title: Licence to Depart
description: Nichola Peterson, ex-policewoman is at the lowest point of her fortunes: her career in ruins, forcibly separated from the man she loves, and powerless to stop a criminal mastermind from wreaking havoc. Then the mysterious Magus appears, offering her one last chance of redemption.Suddenly - a shot rings out...This is the third book in the "Magus" trilogy.Suitable for adult readers.
author: Alex Sumner
